title: Ticket #4663: Be able to throttle the number of startd ads accepted by the collector
description:
The user in this RUST ticket wants to be able to do something like this in their configuration: 

  COLLECTOR_MAX_STARTD_ADS = 250

(Their problem is that they are running out of memory because of the number of startd ads. I'm not that sure how much sense this idea makes, but I thought I'd at least record the request.)
creator: wenger
